description: This header file defines utility functions within the Utils namespace that aid in file synchronization and JSON settings persistence. It provides inline functions for synchronizing file states and updating JSON settings files, primarily used for ensuring data consistency in persistent storage.
external_files: json-related dependency for JsonValue and JsonObject (assuming inclusion elsewhere)

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes a file to ensure all buffered data is written to disk by opening the file, flushing buffer, syncing to disk, then closing.

methods.description: Updates a JSON settings file with a specific key-value pair, ensuring the changes are written and synchronized to disk.
